entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, 25.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fredericton Int'l Airport 5:00 PM ADT Saturday 10 September 2016
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: 25.6°C
Pressure: 101.8 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 40 %
Humidex: 27
Dewpoint: 11.0°C
Wind: E 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness this evening then 60 percent chance of showers overnight. Risk of thundershowers overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday: Showers or thundershowers. High 26.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early in the morning. Showers or thundershowers beginning near noon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 10 mm in the heaviest showers. Wind south 20 km/h becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 26. Humidex 34. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers or thundershowers. Low 9.
entry.summary: Showers or thundershowers ending in the evening then clearing. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 10 September 2016
